nodes.text: Star Wars Expert Guide is a Star Wars reference title from Dorling Kindersley, published in hardcover on April 18, 2016. The title is currently slated as an exclusive release in Tesco stores in the United Kingdom. The book contains content previously published in Star Wars: The Force Awakens: The Visual Dictionary (2015), Star Wars: Beware the Sith (2012), Star Wars: Battles for the Galaxy (2011), and Star Wars: Mysteries of the Jedi (2011).

Get ready to become a Star Wars ace! From Jedi to Sith, rebels to Imperials, clones to stormtroopers, lightsabers, vehicles and droids – this brilliant book is jam-packed with facts about Star Wars. Includes exciting new characters from Star Wars: The Force Awakens.
